string-array.item: 8. APPLICATION OF CALCULUS TO ECONOMICS AND MANAGEMENT SCIENCES
9. MATHEMATICS IN ECONOMICS AND MANAGEMENT SCIENCES

resources.string:
THE SSC106 WAY android application is a very powerful tool for total success in the course of SSC106. The android application includes three sections. 
 WELCOME: This covers the complete overview of the course, SSC106, it also explains a detailed topic review of each course, and a chapter that explains basic rudiments of operations in mathematics; 
 DETAILED EXPLANATORY TEXTBOOK: This is the most powerful aspect of the android application, beyond a textbook, it breaks the concepts of all topics in SSC106 down, explaining in simple terms, explaining in writing (like a teacher teaching you), giving a lot of examples and etc.
 It is the core to the fact that you can make nothing less than an A in this course as the completely demystified explanations leaves you with no choice but to pass! You have a thorough motivation to read as it uses simple terms to explain every bit of it. You are glued for hours reading since you enjoy reading what you understand; it is a simple academic principle. 
 CONCISE PAST QUESTIONS AND SOLUTIONS: An icing on the cake, after the wholly destroyed concepts in the detailed explanatory textbook, a concise thorough broken down solutions of all examination past questions from 2001 till date was given in the android application. 
 All solutions refer to the explanations in the textbook section, confirming that every part of this course has been treated comprehensively with a thoroughly detailed explanation.
MATHEMATICS IN ECONOMICS AND MANAGEMENT SCIENCES
